 Luzbel/Attilla::
 
Attilla and Luzbel transformed to Beasto mode (Transmetal Dragons) and flew behind Panzer.
  logomorph@... wrote: Panzer::

"Ah. Pleased to meet you. If you don't mind, I'm not looking for a 
confrontation, so I'll just be on my...."
She then felt something hit her shoulder.  She jumped as it shocked 
her.  She fell to her knees and shuttered from the jolt. Her optics 
were scrambled.  She transformed into panther mode and started 
running away from the bots.  Her optics only viewed a blurry 
picture.  She ran up and hit a boulder with her shoulder. "OUCH!" Her 
footing was shaking as she tried to make her way. She opened her 
commlink on all frequencies,"Maximal in dire need of assistance. 
Under attack from Preds. Send..." as she hit a large boulder face 
first.  She stood up, dizzy and trying to gain her barings. 


DarkMouse::
She smiled as she saw her shot hit it's mark.  With Galvatron behind 
her, she smirked at the other bot. "I'm not just a rodent thank you 
very much. And cheese is for whimps."  She turned to see the big 
black cat runn off. "Hey, she's getting away!"
